GapFillDropdown.Title: Questions
GapFillDropdown.Instruction: Click on the correct question for each answer.
GapFillDropdown.ContentGapFillDropdown:
1. A: Do you can swim? Can you swim? Is you can swim? 00B: Yes, I can.
2. A: How old your brothers are? How old do you brothers ? How old are your brothers? 00B: John is sixteen and Robert is twelve.
3. A: Where you did go to school? Where did you go to school? Where were you go to school? 00B: In a small school in the countryside.
4. A: What you are doing next week? What is you doing next week? What are you doing next week? 00B: We're going skiing.
5. A: What kind of music do you listen to? What kind of music you listen to? What kind of music does you listen to? 00B: Reggae and jazz.
6. A: Have you visited many museums? Has you visited many museums? Did you visited many museums? 00B: Yes, six or seven.
7. A: Was you good at sport when you were younger? Did you be good at sport when you were younger? Were you good at sport when you were younger? 00B: Yes, I was. I was in most of the teams.
8. A: What you did do at the weekend? What did you do at the weekend? What did you at the weekend? 00B: I stayed at home and relaxed.
9. A: Are they going to pass their exams?They are going to pass their exams?Do they going to pass their exams?00B: I think so. They worked hard.
10. A: Did she ever spoken to you? Has she ever speak to you? Has she ever spoken to you? 00B: Yes. We said "good morning" once.
